page.title: 12Mobile Amenities.
page.content: Many mobile amenities serve the semi- isolated community, visiting on a regular basis as there is only one shop, the Post Office, for many miles. {Milk}is delivered six days weekly.The {bus service}brings newspapers to the Post Office daily.A{baker}calls twice each week delivering bread to the Post Office to fulfill orders.Another{baker provides door to door service on Wednesdays.{Rington's tea}have begun supplying their products,fortnightly, collecting orders in advance.A van supplying fruit and vegetables also calls each Tuesday. In addition, the{dustman}collects refuse, alternating between Wednesday one week, Friday,the next.The{Mobile {Library Service}offers people the chance to choose library books each month.
